Producer: Laurie Cook, Casey Herbert, Xavier Marchand, Jason Newmark
Production Co: AGC Studios, Moonriver Content, Bigscope Films
Synopsis: In CONSECRATION, after the suspicious death of her brother, a priest, Grace (Jena Malone) goes to the Mount Saviour Convent in Scotland to find out what really happened. Once there, she uncovers murder, sacrilege and a disturbing truth about her own past.
Title: Consecration
